# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your productivity and efficiency. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your life or work. I'm offering this exceptional item to you for $100, considering its worth and the benefits it provides. I trust this price reflects not only the cost but also the immense value it offers. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
